name: World Truck Racing
description: Sit behind the wheel of monsters with over 4000 hp engines in brand new arcade style racing game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Core 2 Duo 1.8GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 9600GT or better w /256MB vram DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Core i5 or AMD equivalent Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB GeForce GTS 450 or Radeon equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible

reviews.review_text: Well it looks like a trash and drives like a trash (at least on keyboard). But maybe somebody would be patient enough to get used to such handling and start getting fun.  I do not recommend.  -----------  Выглядит как треш и ездит как треш (по крайней мере на клаве). Ну, возможно, при достаточном терпении можно привыкнуть и получать какое-то удовольствие.  Но в целом не могу рекомендовать.

This game was so crap, I don't know why I bought it, OH I know, the pics and vid of it show it being a fun interesting game, but instead there is little to it, the menu's blow, customization is so poor, graphics are crap on the highest settings using a high end gaming machine. I live in Australia and we have the right to money back on broke & 'not as advertised' products. But this game is so pathetic I won't waste my time.
Never can't get pass race five it get freeze on loading screen

Critic: No!!! I have cancer now :'( ... The controls are pure evil, you want to turn fast so you press more time the button, but then it turns like hell. OMG! Don't buy this game. 7 were the necessary minutes to see that this game is is crap.  Rating - 13/100  Conclusion: I'm not recommending this game to you guys, because you don't wanna taste horse ♥♥♥♥ ;).
